IGHT\r\nsalads:\tfruit,\tgreen\r\nsalt,\tkosher\r\nsauerkraut\r\nsherry\r\nApple\tand\tshiso\twork\twell\ttogether.\tI\tespecially\tlike\tthem\ttogether\tin\ta\tsorbet.\tI\twill\tuse\ta\tGranny\r\nSmith\tapple\tthat\thas\ta\tnice\ttartness\tcombined\twith\ta\tlittle\tsugar,\tlemon,\tand\tthen\tthe\tshiso.\tThe\tshiso\r\nhas\ta\tcumin\tand\tcinnamon\tflavor\tthat\tis\ta\tnatural\twith\tapple.\r\n—JERRY\tTRAUNFELD,\tTHE\tHERBFARM\t(WOODINVILLE,\tWASHINGTON)\r\nIf\tyou\tstay\tin\tthe\tboundaries\tof\twhat\tpeople\tthink\ta\tdessert\tshould\tbe\tit\tgets\tvery\thard\tto\tdo\tsomething\r\nnew.\tWe\texplain\tthat\tthey\talready\teat\tcarrot\tcake.\tWe\tthink\tparsnip\twill\twork\tinstead\tof\tcarrot\tand\tthat\r\nkabocha\tsquash\twill\twork\tinstead\tof\tpumpkin\tin\ta\tpie.\r\nWhen\tpeople\tsee\teggplant\tin\ta\tdessert\tthey\tautomatically\tthink\tit\twill\tnot\twork.\tYou\thave\tto\thide\tthe\r\nunusual\telement\tand\tplay\tup\twhat\tpeople\tknow\talready.\tThe\tboundaries\tare\tlimitless\twhen\tyou\tthink\tof\r\nall\tthe\tcrossovers\tbetween\tsweet\tand\tsavory.\tDuck\tà\tl’orange\tis\ta\tfruit\tand\tmeat\tcombined,\tso\twhy\tnot\r\nuse\tbacon\tin\ta\tdessert?\tA\tpancake\twith\tmaple\tsyrup\tand\tbacon\ton\tthe\tplate\tis\treally\tsweet\tand\tsavory.\r\nSo\tpeople\talready\teat\tthese\tcombinations\tunconsciously.\r\nFor\tour\tapple-eggplant\tdessert,\twe\tstart\twith\ta\tchoux\tdough\tpiecrust.\tThen\twe\tlayer\tan\talmond\r\ncream-like\tcustard.\tThen\twe\talternate\tapple\tand\teggplant\tslices\tside\tby\tside.\tWe\tuse\tbaby\teggplant\r\nbecause\tit\thas\ta\tspongy\ttexture\tand\tsucks\tup\tmoisture\tfrom\tthe\tcream\tthat\tcan\totherwise\tmake\tthe\tcrust\r\nsoggy\tand\tabsorb\tthe\tjuice\tand\tflavor\tfrom\tthe\tapples\tthat\twould\tnormally\tjust\tevaporate.\tSo\twhen\tyou\r\neat\tthe\teggplant\tand\tapples,\tthe\teggplant\ttastes\tlike\tapples.\r\n—DOMINIQUE\tAND\tCINDY\tDUBY,\tWILD\tSWEETS\t(VANCOUVER)\r\nI\thave\talways\tbeen\tvery\tfond\tof\tchef\tFrédy\tG \twith\ta\tlittle\tcitrus,\tthe\tother\twith\tcaramelized\tbananas—alternated\twith\tcitrus\tbiscuit,\tone\r\ntopped\twith\ta\tbrown\tbutter\tice\tcream,\tand\tthe\tother\twith\tcaramelized\tbanana.\tSo\tI\thave\tthese\tthree\r\nflavors—banana,\tcitrus,\tand\tbrown\tbutter—tied\ttogether\twith\ta\tsalted\tpeanut–caramel\tsauce.\r\n—MICHAEL\tLAISKONIS,\tLE\tBERNARDIN\t(NEW\tYORK\tCITY)\r\nA\tbanana’s\tripeness\twill\tdetermine\twhat\tyou\tdo\twith\tit.\tI\tlike\tmy\tbananas\tyellow\tand\tfirm.\tIf\tyou\tare\r\ngoing\tto\tmake\ta\tbananas\tFoster\tand\tyour\tbananas\tare\tvery\tyellow,\tyou\tcan\tcook\tthem\tlonger\tand\tthey\r\nwon’t\tfall\tapart\tor\tturn\tto\tmush.\tIf\tyou\tstart\twith\ta\tbanana\tthat\tis\tpretty\tbrown,\tthe\tsecond\tyou\tadd\theat,\r\nit\tfalls\tapart.\tA\tbrown\tbanana\tgives\tme\tshivers!\r\n—EMILY\tLUCHETTI,\tFARALLON\t(SAN\tFRANCISCO)\r\nFlavor\tAffinities\r\nbanana\t+\tblackberries\t+\tcream\r\nbanana\t+\tbrown\tbutter\t+\tcaramel\t+\tcitrus\t+\tpeanuts\r\nbanana\t+\tcaramel\t+\tchocolate\r\nbanana\t+\tcaramel\t+\tcrème\tfraîche\t+\tlemongrass\r\nbanana\t+\tcoconut\t+\tcream\r\nbanana\t+\tcream\t+\thoney\t+\tmacadamia\tnuts\t+\tvanilla\r\nbanana\t+\tcream\t+\tmango\r\nbanana\t+\tdates\t+\toatmeal\r\nbanana\t+\thoney\t+\tsesame\tseeds\r\nbanana\t+\tmacadamia\tnuts\t+\trum\r\nbanana\t+\toats\t+\tpecans\r\nBARLEY\r\nTaste:\tsweet,\tastringent\r\nFunction:\tcooling\r\nTechniques:\tsimmer\r\nbeef\r\nbutter\r\ngarlic\r\nlemon\tthyme\r\nmirepoix\t(carrots,\tcelery,\tonions)\r\nmushrooms:\tcultivated,\twild\t(e.g.,\tshiitakes)\r\nolive\toil\r\nonions\r\noregano\r\nparsley,\tflat-leaf\r\npepper,\twhite\r\nsage\r\nsalt,\tkosher\r\nsavory\r\nscallions\r\nsoups\r\nstocks:\tchicken,\tvegetable\r\nthyme\r\ntomatoes\r\nvinegar,\tsherry\r\nI\tuse\tbasil\ta\tlot.\tI\twill\tadd\tit\tat\tthe\tvery\tend\tof\tcooking\ta\tdish,\tand\tit\twill\ttotally\tchange\twhere\tthe\tdish\r\nis\tgoing.\tAdded\tat\tthe\tlast\tsecond,\tit\tgives\ta\tminty\tfreshness\tthat\tw \twith\tcinnamon\tand\r\nglazed\toranges.\tBridging\tspring\tinto\tsummer,\twe’ll\toffer\tcorn\tand\tsaffron\tpancakes\twith\ta\tspicy\r\npoached\tpear\tand\tfresh\tricotta.\tSaffron\tand\tcorn\twork\treally\twell\ttogether\tbecause\tof\tthe\tfloral\tnature\r\nof\tthe\tsaffron\tand\tsweetness\tof\tthe\tcorn.\tWe\twill\tuse\tpoached\tpears\ton\tthe\tpancakes\tuntil\tswitching\tto\r\nblueberries\tfor\tthe\tsummer,\twhich\tgive\ta\treal\tpop.\tThe\tpears\tare\tpoached\tin\ta\tred\twine\tsyrup\twith\r\naleppo\tchile\tthat\tis\ta\tsundried\tchile\twith\ta\trich,\tround,\tsweet\tspice\tto\tit.\tThe\tchile\tis\tnot\tnoticeable,\tbut\r\nit\tacts\tlike\tan\tacid\tby\tlightening,\tplus\tcutting\tthe\tsugar\tand\trichness\tof,\tthe\tpancake.\r\nWhen\tpeople\teat\tpancakes,\tthey\tnaturally\treach\tfor\tbutter.\tI\tdon’t\tserve\tbutter\twith\tmy\tpancakes\tand\r\ninstead\tserve\tfresh\tricotta.\tWe\tuse\tricotta\tfrom\tAnne\tSaxelby,\twho\tsupplies\tus\twith\ta\tfresh,\trich,\r\nvelvety\tricotta,\tand\tthis\tgives\ta\trichness\tto\tthe\tdish.\r\n—BRAD\tFARMERIE,\tPUBLIC\t(NEW\tYORKCITY)\r\nBRUSSELS\tSPROUTS\r\nSeason:\tautumn–winter\r\nTaste:\tbitter\r\nBotanical\trelatives:\tbroccoli,\tcabbage,\tcauliflower,\tcollard\tgreens,\tkale,\tkohlrabi\r\nWeight:\tmoderate–heavy\r\nVolume:\tmoderate–loud\r\nTechniques:\tboil,\tbraise,\tsauté,\tsimmer,\tsteam,\tstew,\tstir-fry\r\nalmonds\r\napple\tcider\r\napples\tand\tapple\tjuice\tor\tcider\r\nartichokes,\tJerusalem\r\nBACON\r\nbasil\r\nbay\tleaf\r\nbread\tcrumbs\r\nBUTTER,\tunsalted\r\ncelery\r\ncelery\troot\r\nCHEESE:\tblue,\tcheddar,\tgoat,\tParmesan,\tprovolone,\tricotta,\tSwiss\r\nchestnuts\r\nchives\r\ncoriander\r\ncream\r\ncrème\tfraîche\r\ndill\r\neggs,\thard-boiled\r\nfennel\tseeds\r\ngarlic\r\nhazelnuts\r\njuniper\tberries\r\nlemon,\tjuice\r\nmarjoram\r\nmustard,\tDijon\r\nnutmeg\r\noil,\tmustard\r\nolive\toil\r\nonions\r\npancetta\r\npaprika\r\nparsley,\tflat-leaf\r\npepper:\tblack,\twhite\r\npotatoes,\tesp.\tmashed\r\nsalt: ISKONIS,\tLE\tBERNARDIN\t(NEW\tYORK\tCITY)\r\nCabbage\toften\thas\tthe\tconnotation\tof\tbeing\theavy,\tbut\tin\tthe\tfall,\twe’ll\tmake\ta\tfine\tchiffonade\tof\r\ncabbage\tthat’s\tvery\tlight.\tI\tlike\tto\tcut\tcabbage\tthin\tand\troast\tit\tin\ta\tpan\tso\tthat\tthe\tedges\tjust\tget\tbrown\r\nbecause\tthat\ttastes\treally\tgood.\tWe\tfigured\tthat\tout\tby\tmistake\tby\tputting\tcabbage\tinto\ttoo\thot\ta\tpan.\r\nAfter\tthe\tchef\traised\this\tvoice\tabout\thow\tthat\tis\tthe\twrong\tway\tto\tcook\tcabbage,\twe\ttasted\tit,\tand\tit\r\nwas\tgood!\tWe\tnow\tserve\ta\tgreen\tcabbage\tdish\tcooked\tthis\tway\twith\tcaraway\tseeds\tand\twalnuts,\tthen\r\ndeglazed\twith\tCalvados.\tWe\talso\tadd\ta\tlittle\tcider\tvinegar\tand\tolive\toil\tto\tfinish.\tIt\tis\ta\tnice,\teasy\r\nmarriage.\tIt\tis\tnot\tan\tunpredictable\tmarriage;\tthese\tthings\tjust\tall\twork\ttogether.\tWe\tpair\tthis\twith\r\nbraised\tpork\tbelly,\tbut\tit\twould\talso\twork\twith\ta\troasted\tbreast\tof\tsquab\twith\tits\tleg\tdone\tin\ta\tconfit.\r\n—MICHAEL\tANTHONY,\tGRAMERCY\tTAVERN\t(NEW\tYORK\tCITY)\r\nCABBAGE—IN\tGENERAL\r\nSeason:\tautumn–winter\r\nBotanical\trelatives:\tbroccoli,\tBrussels\tsprouts,\tcauliflower,\tcollard\tgreens,\tkale,\tkohlrabi\r\nFunction:\tcooling\r\nWeight:\tmedium\r\nVolume:\tmoderate\r\nTechniques:\tboil,\tbraise,\traw,\tsauté,\tsteam,\tstir-fry\r\napples\tand\tapple\tcider\r\nBACON\r\nbay\tleaf\r\nbeef\r\nbell\tpeppers,\tred\r\nbutter,\tunsalted\r\nCARAWAY\tSEEDS\r\ncarrots\r\ncelery:\tleaves,\tsalt,\tseeds\r\nChampagne\r\ncheese:\tcheddar,\tfeta,\tgoat,\tParmesan,\tSwiss,\tTaleggio,\tTeleme\r\nchestnuts\r\nchicken\r\nchili\tsauce\r\nchile\tpeppers:\tdried\tred,\tfresh\tgreen\t(e.g.,\tjalapeño)\r\ncilantro\r\nclove\r\ncoconut\r\ncoleslaw\t(key\tingredient)\r\ncoriander\r\ncorned\tbeef\r\ncream\r\ncumin\r\ncurry\tleaves\r\ndill\r\nduck\r\nfat:\trendered\tchicken,\tduck\r\nfennel\r\nfennel\tseeds\r\ngame\tbirds\r\ngarlic\r\nginger\r\nham\r\nhorseradish\r\njicam ish,\tso\tit\tis\tnot\tbig,\tfat,\tand\tflabby\ton\tthe\tpalate.\r\n—BRAD\tFARMERIE,\tPUBLIC\t(NEW\tYORK\tCITY)\r\nI\tworked\tin\tan\tIndian\trestaurant\tas\ta\twaiter\tfor\tfour\tyears.\tI\tlove\tcooking\twith\tIndian\tingredients.\r\nEverything\tI\tlearned\tat\tthe\tCIA\twas\tthrown\tout\tthe\twindow\twhen\tI\tlearned\tIndian\tcooking,\twhich\tis\r\nwhere\tI\tpicked\tup\tmany\ttechniques\tand\tphilosophies.\tI\tnow\troast\tmy\town\tspices\tand\tcreate\tspice\r\nblends.\tI\tlove\tcreating\tmy\town\tflavor\tcombinations.\tI\tcame\tto\tlove\ta\tgaram\tmasala\tmade\twith\tfennel,\r\ncinnamon,\tclove,\tcumin,\tand\tcoriander.\tEach\tof\tthese\tfive\tspices\thas\ta\tdistinctive\tflavor,\tbut\tcombined\r\nthey\tcreate\tone\tsingle\tflavor\tthat\tis\tamazing.\tI\twill\tuse\tmy\tgaram\tmasala\tmixture\tin\tsoups\tand\tsauces.\r\nWhen\tpeople\task\tabout\tthe\tdish,\tthey\talways\task,\t“What\twas\tthat\tflavor?”\r\n—BOB\tIACOVONE,\tCUVÉE\t(NEW\tORLEANS)\r\nAVOID\r\nbeef,\tfor\treligious\treasons,\tsay\tsome\r\npork,\tfor\treligious\treasons,\tsay\tsome\r\nFlavor\tAffinities\r\ncinnamon\t+\tcloves\t+\tmace\t+\tnutmeg\r\ncoriander\t+\tcumin\t+\tturmeric\r\ncoriander\t+\tcumin\t+\tyogurt\r\ncumin\t+\tgarlic\t+\tginger\r\ncumin\t+\tgarlic\t+\tyogurt\r\ngarlic\t+\tginger\r\ngarlic\t+\tginger\t+\tonion\r\npotatoes\t+\tchili\tpowder\t+\tturmeric\r\nyogurt\t+\tfruit\r\nINDONESIAN\tCUISINE\r\nchicken\r\nchile\tpeppers\r\ncoconut\r\ncoriander\r\nfish\r\ngarlic\r\ngrilled\tdishes\r\nlemongrass\r\nmolasses\r\nnoodles\r\npeanuts\r\npepper\r\nrice\r\nshellfish\r\nshrimp\tpaste\r\nsoy\tsauce\r\nspices,\tesp.\tclove,\tnutmeg,\tpepper\r\nstir-fried\tdishes\r\nsugar,\tbrown\r\nvegetables\r\nFlavor\tAffinities\r\nchile\tpeppers\t+\tpeanuts\t+\tsoy\tsauce\r\ngarlic\t+\tpeanuts\t+\tsoy\tsauce\r\ngarlic\t+\tsoy\tsauce\t+\tbrown\tsugar\r\nIRANIAN\tCUISINE\r\n(aka\tPersian\tCuisine)\r\napricots\r\nbasil\r\nbeans\r\nchicken\r\ncinnamon\r\ndates\r\ndill\r\nduck\r\nfish\r\ngarlic\r\nherbs\r\nkebabs\ arinades\r\nmarjoram\r\nMediterranean\tcuisine\r\nonions\r\noregano\r\nparsley\r\npâtés\r\npepper\r\npork\r\nrosemary\r\nsage\r\nsalmon\r\nsauces\r\nsauerkraut\r\nsavory\r\nScandinavian\tcuisine\r\nstuffings,\tesp.\tbread\r\nthyme\r\nveal\r\nVENISON\r\nwine,\tred\r\nFlavor\tAffinities\r\njuniper\tberries\t+\tgame\t+\tgarlic\t+\trosemary\r\nKAFFIR\tLIMES\tAND\tKAFFIR\tLIME\tLEAF\r\n(See\talso\tLemons,\tLimes,\tetc.)\r\nSeason:\tyear-round\r\nTaste:\tsour\r\nWeight:\tlight\r\nVolume:\tmoderate–loud\r\nTechniques:\tstir-fry\r\nbasil,\tThai\r\nbeef\r\ncardamom\r\nchicken\r\nchile\tpeppers\r\ncilantro\r\ncoconut\tand\tcoconut\tmilk\r\ncoriander\r\ncumin\r\ncurry\tpastes\tand\tcurries\r\nfish\r\nginger\r\nIndian\tcuisine\r\nIndonesian\tcuisine\r\nlemongrass\r\nlime,\tjuice\r\nmarinades\r\nmushrooms\r\nnoodles\r\npork\r\npoultry\r\nrice\r\nsalads\r\nsesame\r\nshellfish\r\nsoups,\tesp.\tThai\r\nstar\tanise\r\nsugar\r\ntamarind\r\nTHAI\tCUISINE\r\nturmeric\r\nvegetables,\tesp.\tgreen\r\nFlavor\tAffinities\r\nkaffir\tlime\t+\tsaffron\t+\tseafood\r\nkaffir\tlime\tleaf\t+\tduck\t+\tginger\r\nkaffir\tlime\tleaf\t+\trice\t+\tturmeric\r\nKALE\r\nSeason:\tautumn–spring\r\nTaste:\tbitter,\tsweet\r\nBotanical\trelatives:\tbroccoli,\tBrussels\tsprouts,\tcabbage,\tcauliflower,\tcollard\tgreens,\tkohlrabi\r\nWeight:\theavy\r\nVolume:\tmoderate\r\nTechniques:\tblanch,\tboil,\tbraise,\tsauté,\tsteam,\tstir-fry\r\nbay\tleaf\r\nbell\tpeppers,\tred\r\nbutter\r\ncheese:\tcheddar,\tParmesan\r\nchicken,\troasted\r\ncream\r\nGARLIC\r\nginger\r\nlemon\r\nmeats,\troasted\r\nnutmeg\r\nOIL:\tgrapeseed,\tvegetable\r\nolive\toil\r\nonions,\tesp.\tyellow\r\noregano\r\npancetta\r\npasta\r\npepper:\tblack,\twhite\r\npork\r\npotatoes\r\nred\tpepper\tflakes\r\nsalt,\tkosher\r\nsausage,\tchorizo\r\nshallots\r\nsour\tcream\r\nsoy\tsauce\r\nstock,\tchicken\r\nsugar\r\nsweet\tpotatoes\r\nthyme\r\ntomatoes\r\nvinegar,\tred\twine\r\nFlavor\tAffinities\r\nkale\t+\tgarlic\t+\tolive\toil\t+\tred\twine\tvinegar\r\nkale\t+\tonions\t+\tsalt\t+\tsmoked\tsausage\r\nI\tlike\tkale\tblanched\tthen\tsautéed\twith\tsome\tonions,\ta\tpinch\tof\tsalt,\tand\tsome\tsmoked\tsausage.\r\n—GABRIEL\tKREUTHER,\tTHE\tMODERN\t(NEW\tYORK\tCITY)\r\nKIWI\tFRUIT\r\nSeason:\tlate\tautumn–spring\r\nTaste:\tsour\r\nWeight:\tmedium\r\nVolume:\tquiet–moderate\r\nTechniques:\traw\r\nbananas\r\nberries\r\ncherries\r\nchocolate:\tdark,\twhite\r\ncoconut\r\ncream\tand\tice\tcream\r\ncrust:\tpastry\tor\tpie\r\ncustard\r\ngrapefruit\r\nhazelnuts\r\nhoney\r\nKirsch\r\nlemon:\tjuice,\tzest\r\nlime\r\nlychee\r\nmacadamia\tnuts\r\nmangoes\r\noranges\r\npapaya\r\npassion\tfruit\r\npineapple\r\nrum\r\nsalad,\tesp.\tchicken\tor\tfruit\r\nstrawberries\r\nsugar\r\nwine:\tChampagne,\tice\twine\r\nKOHLRABI\r\n(See\talso\tRutabagas,\tTurnips)\r\nSeason:\tsummer–autumn\r\nBotanical\trelatives:\tbroccoli,\tBrussels\tsprouts,\tcabbage,\tcauliflower,\tcollard\tgreens,\tkale\r\nWeight:\tmedium\t(esp.\twhen\tyounger)–heavy\t(esp.\twhen\tolder)\r\nVolume:\tmoderate\t(esp.\twhen\tyounger)–loud\t(esp.\twhen\tolder)\r\nTechniques:\tboil,\tsteam,\tstir-fry\r\nallspice\r\nbasil\r\nbutter,\tunsalted\r\ncabbage\r\ncarrots\r\ncelery\r\ncelery\tleaves\tor\tseeds\r\ncelery\troot\r\ncheese,\tesp.\tParmesan,\tSwiss\r\nchervil\r\ncilantro\r\ncoriander\r\ncream\r\ndill\r\nfennel\tleaves\tor\tseeds\r\ngarlic\r\nhorseradish\r\nleeks\r\nlemon,\tjuice\r\nlovage\r\nmace\r\nmustard\t(e.g.,\tDijon)\r\nmustard\tseeds\r\nonions\r\nparsley,\tflat-leaf\r\npepper,\tblack\r\npotatoes\r\nrosemary\r\nsalt,\tesp.\tsea\r\nsesame\toil,\tseeds\r\nsoups\r\nsour\tcream\r\nsoy\tsauce\r\nstews\r\ntamari\r\nturmeric\r\nvinegar,\tred\twine\r\nKohlrabi\tis\tan\tunderrated\tvegetable.\tI\tadmit\tit\thas\tnot\talways\tbeen\tone\tof\tmy\tfavorites,\tbut\tit\thas\tgrown\r\non\tme\tover\tthe\tyears.\tNow,\tI\tlove\tit.\tI\tcan’t\tprecisely\tplace\tits\tflavor,\twhich\tis\tsomewhere\tbetween\ta\r\nturnip,\tradish,\tand\tcauliflower.\tBut\tit\ttastes\tgreat\tand\tis\treally\tv
